error.cancel-order-lines-invalid-order-state: Cannot cancel OrderLines from an Order in the "{ state }" state
error.cancel-order-lines-quantity-too-high: Quantity to cancel is greater than existing OrderLine quantity
error.cannot-modify-role: The role '{ roleCode }' cannot be modified
error.cannot-create-sales-for-active-order: Cannot create a Sale for an Order which is still active
error.cannot-move-collection-into-self: Cannot move a Collection into itself
error.cannot-remove-option-group-due-to-varian: Cannot remove ProductOptionGroup "{ code }" as it is used by {count, plural, one {1 ProductVariant} other {# ProductVariants}}
error.cannot-transition-order-from-to: Cannot transition Order from "{ fromState }" to "{ toState }"
error.cannot-transition-payment-from-to: Cannot transition Payment from "{ fromState }" to "{ toState }"
error.cannot-transition-refund-from-to: Cannot transition Refund from "{ fromState }" to "{ toState }"
error.cannot-transition-to-shipping-when-order: Cannot transition Order to the "ArrangingShipping" state when it is empty
error.cannot-transition-to-payment-without-cus: Cannot transition Order to the "ArrangingPayment" state without Customer details
error.channel-not-found: No channel with the token "{ token }" exists
error.country-code-not-valid: The countryCode "{ countryCode }" was not recognized
error.create-fulfillment-items-already-fulfill: One or more OrderItems have already been fulfilled
error.create-fulfillment-orders-must-be-settle: One or more OrderItems belong to an Order which is in an invalid state
error.email-address-not-available: This email address is not available
error.email-address-not-verified: Please verify this email address before logging in
error.entity-has-no-translation-in-language: Translatable entity '{ entityName }' has not been translated into the requested language ({ languageCode })
error.entity-with-id-not-found: No { entityName } with the id '{ id }' could be found
error.field-invalid-datetime-range-max: The custom field '{ name }' value [{ value }] is greater than the maximum [{ max }]
error.field-invalid-datetime-range-min: The custom field '{ name }' value [{ value }] is less than the minimum [{ min }]
error.field-invalid-number-range-max: The custom field '{ name }' value [{ value }] is greater than the maximum [{ max }]
error.field-invalid-number-range-min: The custom field '{ name }' value [{ value }] is less than the minimum [{ min }]
error.field-invalid-string-option: The custom field '{ name }' value ['{ value }'] is invalid. Valid options are [{ validOptions }]
error.field-invalid-string-pattern: The custom field '{ name }' value ['{ value }'] does not match the pattern [{ pattern }]
error.forbidden: You are not currently authorized to perform this action
error.invalid-sort-field: The sort field '{ fieldName }' is invalid. Valid fields are: { validFields }
error.missing-password-on-registration: A password must be provided when `authOptions.requireVerification` is set to "false"
error.no-search-plugin-configured: No search plugin has been configured
error.no-valid-channel-specified: No valid channel was specified (ensure the 'vendure-token' header was specified in the request)
error.order-contents-may-only-be-modified-in-a: Order contents may only be modified when in the "AddingItems" state
error.order-does-not-contain-line-with-id: This order does not contain an OrderLine with the id { id }
error.order-item-quantity-must-be-positive: { quantity } is not a valid quantity for an OrderItem
error.order-items-limit-exceeded: Cannot add items. An order may consist of a maximum of { maxItems } items
error.order-lines-must-belong-to-same-order: OrderLines must all belong to a single Order
error.payment-may-only-be-added-in-arrangingpa: A Payment may only be added when Order is in "ArrangingPayment" state
error.permission-invalid: The permission "{ permission }" is not valid
error.product-id-or-slug-must-be-provided: Either the product id or slug must be provided
error.product-id-slug-mismatch: The provided id and slug refer to different Products
error.product-variant-option-ids-not-compatibl: ProductVariant optionIds must include one optionId from each of the groups: {groupNames}
error.product-variant-options-combination-alre: A ProductVariant already exists with the options: {optionNames}
error.refund-order-item-already-refunded: Cannot refund an OrderItem which has already been refunded
error.refund-order-lines-invalid-order-state: Cannot refund an Order in the "{ state }" state
error.refund-order-lines-quantity-too-high: Quantity to refund is greater than existing OrderLine quantity
error.refund-order-payment-lines-mismatch: The Payment and OrderLines do not belong to the same Order
error.stockonhand-cannot-be-negative: stockOnHand cannot be a negative value
error.verification-token-has-expired: Verification token has expired. Use refreshCustomerVerification to send a new token.
error.unauthorized: The credentials did not match. Please check and try again
error.unexpected-password-on-registration: Do not provide a password when `authOptions.requireVerification` is set to "true"
